title: Slow Cooker Contest-Winning Chicken Cacciatore Recipe
directions: Place onions in a 5-qt. slow cooker. Add the chicken, seasonings, tomatoes, tomato sauce, mushrooms and wine.
Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until chicken is tender. Discard bay leaf. Serve chicken with sauce over pasta. Yield: 6 servings.
ingredients: 1 broiler/fryer chicken (3 to 4 pounds), cut up and skin removed
1 can (4 ounces) mushroom stems and pieces, drained, or 1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms
